mapper.insert: insert into evaluation_information (o_id, d_id, d_name, s_id, s_name, fraction, e_content) values (#{oId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fraction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update evaluation_information set o_id = #{oId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_id = #{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, d_name = #{dName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, s_id = #{sId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, s_name = #{sName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fraction = #{fraction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, e_content = #{eContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where e_id = #{eId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select e_id, o_id,d_id, d_name, s_id, s_name, fraction, e_content from evaluation_information
and fraction <= 1
and fraction > 1 and fraction <= 2
and fraction > 2 and fraction <= 3
and fraction > 3 and fraction <= 4
and fraction = 5
and d_name like concat('%',#{dName},'%')
and s_name like concat('%',#{sName},'%')

select count (*) from evaluation_information
and fraction <= 1
and fraction > 1 and fraction <= 2
and fraction > 2 and fraction <= 3
and fraction > 3 and fraction <= 4
and fraction = 5
and d_name like concat('%',#{dName},'%')
and s_name like concat('%',#{sName},'%')
select * from evaluation_information where o_id = #{oId} limit 0,1
